Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.
